Original:

Only after holding up the hand and greeting!When I started ordering, I was told that the kitchen was too busy, and I had to wait at least 20 minutes to start serving!At that time, there were only about 30%of guests in the store!I can only get up and leave!
I have been to the shop in Taichung before, and I am very impressed; but this time I came to Neihu Store to destroy my confidence in the head!I'm not sure if his beer and meals are still excellent, but the service is extremely bad!The bar staff, reception staff, and even kitchen staff in the store may need to be rectified!
